long_description: The Gerber Ripstop 1 Knife & Flashlight Set gives you 2 essential compact and lightweight tools for your outdoor adventures. The all-stainless-steel construction of the super-lightweight Gerber Ripstop I Serrated Knife is made lighter by the cutouts in the streamlined handle and blade. Straight-edge blade easily handles all kinds of chores around camp. Frame-lock design has dual thumb studs that make opening the blade a snap; closing it is also a simple 1-handed step. Powered by 1 included AAA battery, the lightweight Tempo LED flashlight won't weigh you down. Regulated output keeps brightness level consistent throughout the life of the battery; LED bulb provides bright, long-lasting light. Anodized aluminum body is rugged and lightweight. The Gerber Ripstop 1 Knife and Flashlight Set has a Ti-Nitride PVD coating and comes with a ballistic nylon sheath that fits both knife and light.
short_description: The Gerber Ripstop 1 Knife & Flashlight Set gives you 2 essential compact and lightweight tools for your outdoor adventures.
